t: Urgent Prayer for the Restored Favor of God

To the Chief Musician. Set to “Lily of the Testimony.” A Michtam of David. For teaching. When he fought against Mesopotamia and Syria of Zobah, and Joab returned and killed twelve thousand Edomites in the Valley of Salt.
O*pn God, You have cast us off; You*ld have broken us down; You*ld have been displeased; Oh,*ld restore us again!
You*ld have made the earth tremble; You*ld have broken it; Heal*ld its breaches, for it is shaking.
You*ld have shown Your people hard things; You*ld have made us drink the wine of confusion.
You*ln have given a banner to those who fear You, That*ld it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah*ipg
That*ld Your beloved may be delivered, Save*ld with*i Your right hand, and hear me.
God*ln has spoken in His holiness: “I*ld will rejoice; I*ld will divide Shechem And*ld measure out the Valley of Succoth.
Gilead*ld is*i Mine, and Manasseh is*i Mine; Ephraim*ld also is*i the helmet for My head; Judah*ld is*i My lawgiver.
Moab*ld is*i My washpot; Over*ld Edom I will cast My shoe; Philistia,*ld shout in triumph because of Me.”
Who*ln will bring me to*i the strong city? Who*ld will lead me to Edom?
Is*ild it*i not You, O God, who*i cast us off? And*ld You, O God, who*i did not go out with our armies?
Give*ld us help from trouble, For*ld the help of man is*i useless.
Through*ld God we will do valiantly, For*ld it*i is*i He who*i shall tread down our enemies.
